protocol.name: P-GSE58231-1
protocol.text: The data were analyzed using Gene Spring GX11 software using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. ID_REF =  VALUE = Normalized signal intensity

protocol.name: P-GSE58231-2
protocol.text: Plants were grown on soil plus perlite for four weeks on a daily 8h light/ 16h dark photoperiod at 22°C.

protocol.name: P-GSE58231-3
protocol.text: RNA of leaves was extracted using Trizol according to manufacturer's instructions

protocol.name: P-GSE58231-4
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol

protocol.name: P-GSE58231-5
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr on GeneChip ATH1 Genome Array.

protocol.name: P-GSE58231-6
protocol.text: Gene chip were scanned with Affymetrix GeneChip® Scanner 3000
